definition: period of low water level (winter in north China)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The total bacteria numbers and population of each section daring the flood period are greater than in dry season.
sentences.chinese: 各斷面的細菌總數和種屬數，都是豐水期大於枯水期。

sentences.english: The Yellow River becomes a continental river in low-water seasons.
sentences.chinese: 在枯水期，黃河也成了“內陸河”了。

sentences.english: The total bacteria numbers and population of each section during the flood period are greater than in dry season.
sentences.chinese: 各斷面的細菌總數和種屬數，都是豐水期大於枯水期。

sentences.english: The status of organic pollution of six river segments was investigated during dry season.
sentences.chinese: 在枯水期調查了G市六個河流斷面的有機污染狀況。

sentences.english: The system persistence time of total Hg was the longest at the period of low water and the shortest in flush time.
sentences.chinese: 總汞的在體系中滯留的時間枯水期最長，豐水期最短。

sentences.english: Poyang Lake has entered dry season 40 days earlier than normal.
sentences.chinese: 鄱陽湖比正常年份提前40天進入枯水期。

definition: Three Gorges Reservoir on the Changjiang or Yangtze
